last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 16
last_episode_to_air.overview: The student council helps Mr. Haetbit celebrate his birthday.

name: Light on Me
overview: A high-teen romance about Woo Tae Kyung, who joined the Saebit Boys High School Council to make friends, meeting his first love there. Woo Tae Kyung, who is blunt and straightforward, is entangled with Noh Shin Woo, who is cold outside but warm inside, Shin Da Won, the most popular student president of the school, and Nam Gung Shion, the mood maker, and depicts friendship and love.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: Tae Kyung used to be a voluntary loner, but now he wants to make some friends. Will Tae Kyung make it through to joining the student council?

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: Being continuously denied makes me so sad. But isn't it suspicious that he hates me like so?

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: How do you feel about a guy that's super nice to everyone? If you keep being nice to me, I'll mistake your intentions.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: There's an annoying person near me. They keep popping up in my head...

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: If we've gotten closer then why do you keep avoiding me?

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: After being confronted by Taekyung, Shinwoo is finally ready to admit he doesn't hate Taekyung after all, and never has.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: The boys of Saebit High School plan a welcome celebration to initiate Taekyung into the school council.

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: The student council boys prepare for a trip with the local girls' school.

episodes.name: Episode 9
episodes.overview: Da On and Shin Woo are unsure of how to be open about their feelings.

episodes.name: Episode 10
episodes.overview: In a look to the past, Shinwoo and Taekyung's first meeting is revealed.

episodes.name: Episode 11
episodes.overview: A picture emerges online, putting stress on Da On and Taekyung.

episodes.name: Episode 12
episodes.overview: Feeling heartbroken over Da On, Taekyung finds comfort in Shin Woo's presence.

episodes.name: Episode 13
episodes.overview: Da On confronts Sohee about the rumor that she was the one who posted the photo of him and Taekyung.

episodes.name: Episode 14
episodes.overview: Taekyung gets volunteered to participate in the New Light Prince Contest.

episodes.name: Episode 15
episodes.overview: New Light Day arrives, but the missing costumes threaten to disrupt the event.

episodes.name: Episode 16
episodes.overview: The student council helps Mr. Haetbit celebrate his birthday.
